1304:2: 1 | bodhisattvasyālakṣaṇacittamācaritasyāpi cittaṃ na karmamu pratiṣṭhitaṃ bhavati |
1304:6: sarvabuddhasamyakprajñārthaṃ na parityajati jātimaraṇaṃ nirvāpayitumaparyantānsattvānanupadhinirvāṇadhātau nādhitiṣṭhati nirvāṇamityucyate bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gambhīraṃ cittamabhisamboddhamanuttarāṃ samyaksambodhim ||
1304:7: 2 | buddhaputrā bodhisattvaḥ paripūrati daśa dharmānna ca pratyāvartate'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksambodheḥ |
1304:9: pathamaṃ bodhisattvo gambhīramutpādayati bodhicittaṃ sattvānapi śikṣayatyutpādayituṃ cittam |
1304:10: dvitīyaṃ nityamabhinandantathāgataṃ priyadānena pūjayati gambhīraṃ cavaropayati kuśalamūlam |
1304:11: tṛtīyaṃ dharmāngaveṣayituṃ gauravacittena pūjayati dharmagurūndharmaḥ śrṛṇvanna ca pariśrāgyati |
1304:12: caturthaṃ paśyanbhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhinnaṃ dvidhāvibhaktaṃ paramparaṃ vivadamānaṃ bhaṇḍanaṃ kurvāṇaṃ gavepayatyupāyaṃ saṃgamayati ca |
1304:13: pañcamaṃ paśyannāṣṭre vardhamānānyaśubhāni kṣīyamāṇānbuddhadharmāndeśayati tathā vācayati yāvadekāmapi gāthāṃ yenānucchinno bhavati dharmaḥ |
1304:14: ekacittaṃ paripālayati dharmaṃ na ca gaṇayati kāyajīvitam |
1304:16: saptamaṃ janayati caryotsāhaṃ gaveṣayati caivaṃ mahāyāanaṃ vaipulyamatigambhīraṃ sūtradharmaṃ bodhisattvapiṭakam |
1304:23: idaṃ sūtraṃ cittamutpādayituṃ nayati cāvabodhayati ca baddhasattvān |
1304:27: kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraścetkāmayante saṃgrahītumanuttarāṃ bodhi deśayitavyamevaṃ rūpaṃ sūtraṃ |
1304:28: jaṃbūdvīpe'nucchedāya [buddhadharmāṇāṃ] aprayeyā aparyantāḥ sattvāḥ śrṛṇvantvidaṃ sūtram |
1304:29: kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraścecchṛṇvantīdaṃ sūtraṃ labhante 'cintyamatītīkṣṇaṃ mahāprajñāvyūhamaprameyaṃ ca puṇyafalavipākam |
1304:31: idaṃ sūtraṃ vivṛṇotyaprameyaṃ supariśuddhaṃ prajñānennaṃ karoti buddhavijaṃ nirantaramanucchinnam |
1304:38: chinatti lobhaṃ mātsaryaṃ śīlabhedaṃ dveṣaṃ kausīdyaṃ vikṣepaṃ mūḍhatāṃ (ca)
1304:40: apanayati karmāvaraṇaṃ vipakāvaraṇaṃ kleśāvaraṇaṃ dṭaṣṭyāvaraṇamavidyāvaraṇaṃ jñānāvaraṇaṃbhāvānāvaraṇaṃ |
1304:44: kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraścetsūtramidaṃ śrutvārocayantyanumodayantyāścaryacittamutpādayanti jñātavyaṃ taiḥ pūjitā aprameyā buddhāḥ |
1304:46: tatkasya hetoḥ asya sūtrasya triṣvadhvasu buddhairācaritatvādyaḥ khalu (mārgā-)
1304:47: vacaraḥ śrṛṇoti cedaṃ sūtraṃ svātmānaṃ dhanyaṃ manyate |
1304:49: yaḥ kaścillikhatīdaṃ vācayatīdaṃ sūtraṃ jñātavyaṃ sa puruṣaḥ prāpnotyaprameyamaparyantaṃ puṇyafalavipākam |
1304:52: yadi kaścidavabudhyārthaṃ tathācarati yathā sarvabuddhairasaṃkhyeyeṣu kalpeṣvakṣayaprajñayā bhāṣitaṃ tasya puṇyafalavipāko'pyakṣayo bhavati |
1304:53: yasminpradeśe dharmaśāstā deśayatīdaṃ sūtraṃ jñātavyaṃ tasminpradeśe stūpaḥ kārayitavyaḥ |
1304:56: edaṃ sūtraṃ yasmindeśe nagarai grāme vihāre kuṭayāṃ vā bhavati jñātavyaṃ tatra bhavati [3 tathāgatasya ] dharmakāyaḥ |
1304:57: yadi puruṣaḥ pūjayati gandhapuṣpaiḥ saṃgītena vitānena camaracchatrairgītaiḥ stautrairnamaskāraiḥ jñātavyaṃ sa puruṣa buddhabījaṃ bahulikaroti ki punarvaktavyaṃ yo niravaśeṣaṃ gṛhṇati dhārayati sūtramidam |
1304:58: sa puruṣaḥ pūrayati puṇyaprajñāniṣpattimanāgate'dhvani labhate vyākaraṇaṃ prāpnityanuttarāṃ samyaksambodhim ||
1304:59: ( iti bodhicittotpādasūtraśāstre puṇyaparigraho nāma dvādaśo vargaḥ || )
